page.title: 17 BOTTINGS
page.content: Bottings is a local farm shop on the {Latchingdon}Road it has been running {25}years.When it started it was a mobile shop selling eggs run by {Mr {Bottings}then it started selling fruit and vegtables as well.Now Bottings sell almost everything. On an average day Bottings is open from{9am-7pm}and serves around {250 people}.In the high summer people come from as far a field as {LONDON} when they are on hoilday. During the winter people come from{DANBURY}and{SOUTH MINSTER}. Bottings is still owned by {Mr {Bottings} but he does not run it anymore.For about 6 months Bottings has been hiring out{VIDEOS}for one pound a day!.
